title: Crappily Ever After
description: For Lucy Ramsey life was supposed to be a Fairytale.Have an exciting career raising the Nation's infants, meet her perfect man and raise four fabulous children from a five storey town house overlooking the Thames.It really shouldn't have been too much to expect, should it?Apparently, it was...Now with her forties looming on the horizon and every relationship ending in disaster, Lucy's Fairytale of choice appears to be 'Gullible And The Seven Losers, featuring Grumpy, Dopey, Psycho, Stalker, Liar, Idiot and Thief!' Lucy detests her job and shoddy flat, she dreams of far off places and forgetting all about meeting Mr. Right.When a lifeline appears in the form of an inheritance from an old friend, Lucy seizes her chance to escape to the sunny shores of Tenerife. Sometimes love has a way of hunting you down no matter how hard you try to hide from it. Is it too late?Or can Lucy learn to trust just one last time?
author: Louise Burness
